Package com.epam.dataaccess.dao.mariadb.impl

Class UserDAOMariaDB

java.lang.Object
com.epam.dataaccess.dao.mariadb.impl.UserDAOMariaDB
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<User>, UserDAO
public class UserDAOMariaDB extends Object implements UserDAO
User DAO implementation for MariaDB. Has methods needed by services to access persistence layer.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hrebenozhko Ruslan
